item.title: APIs
item.description: The Okta APIs Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, phase 1 version can be a very simple guide hub.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Validation: - Internal workshop session: Session 1 - Team 2 chose the Okta APIs group.

item.title: SDKs
item.description: SDKs Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, since it’s a new doc pulling from existing content” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Group Notes Group description: Describe and list all supported SDKs provided by Okta. Does not go into specific use cases. Candidate for a separate workshop. Content Notes New or existing doc?: IA defined in a separate document

item.title: Inline Hooks
item.description: Okta Inline Hooks Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, for phase 1 this guide hub can be a dynamic index” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: changes needed Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Will be hosted in Redocly. This is the overview of the section containing sample JSON content to and from each type of inline hook.

item.title: Velocity template language
item.description: Velocity template language Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, since it’s a new doc pulling from existing content” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: Doc content is pulled from several docs: Customize email notifications: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/custom-email/main/ Velocity template language (help docs): https://help.

item.title: Okta expression language
item.description: Okta expression language Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, since it’s a new doc pulling from existing content” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Group Notes Group description: At the moment, there are two documents. The main one covers the “legacy” Okta expression language and the secondary one covers it in Identity Engine. Suggest that these documents are role-reversed so that the main doc covers all the support for IDX and the secondary doc covers the diffs between it and Classic Engine.

item.title: Roles, resources, and permissions

item.title: Dictionary
item.description: Terminology dictionary Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “No, new content can be created at later phase.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Content type: Glossary A list of terms and definitions specific to the product, service, or domain, helping developers familiarize themselves with the vocabulary used in the documentation.
